People who use Ubuntu/Linux are miserable RANT of loser windows 10 user
text:
WTF? There is not a single pdf reader that's not shit. The firefox pdf reader is buffering ffs. This is the first time I'm seeing a browser buffering for turning a page of pdf in my laptop.

I need a pdf reader that does everything that firefox does, i.e tabbed, persists the page and tabs viewed in last boot. I'm not getting it. How can developers be so lazy or stupid? That they don't even make a single competent pdf reader! And these are same devs who claim they're the best in the world! WTF.

Fck it my badluck man.

And wtf is this scrolling in chromium browsers? Who tf is ok with it? How did nobody could make a browser that scrolled nicely? LOL! Tf. I tried imwheel setup, didn't work. It needs to be built in the browser system itself, you can't use extensions for like every second thing(And extension did no good in this case).

Firefox scrolling is great, but I need an alternate browser as well for my purpose(I use 2 browsers at once).

This is miserable. How can anyone enjoy such shit?

I'm literally crying rn. I can't change stuffs now because I'm working for an urgent exam and I'd to be happy with this setup. But these 2 things fixed would make my life really beautiful.

I tried okular, mupdf, supdf...whatever the fck was available. Okular hogs memory and keeps causing (IDK what it is, everything gets closed, and linux gets locked. It's not restart).

qpdfview was probably the bestest. But it doesn't persists neither tabs nor pages.
